message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it provides significant value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save a bit more. Would you consider selling the product to me for $12,500?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,250?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you consider selling the product to me for $12,750?
